name: Cursed One
description:
«Cursed One» - story-driven first person horror in Fantasy setting.
Humanity is dying from an incurable disease. Hope was beginning to fade, until you found the ancient books, These books talk of a mysterious crypt where the "truly wishful can find their desires". Perhaps an opportunity to stop the epidemic lies there.
What secrets can be found in this mysterious place, and are you worthy enough to reveal them?






  • Fantasy-horror - fall into the vortex of magic, fear, and constant anxiety. The magical Source is in your hands. It will guide you, and be your light in the darkness.
  • Atmosphere - immerse yourself into the dark atmosphere of the underground corridors, large Crypt, vast caves and narrow passages.​
  • Traps - watch your step, be aware of your surroundings, the floor you walk may contain many traps, Some able to cause serious damage, while others may kill you in an instant.​
  • Unknown enemy - run from a creature that follows you tirelessly: hesitate for a second and you'll become his next victim.​
  • Secrets - the Crypt keeps many secrets that are carefully hidden. You may be the first to reveal them.​
  • Puzzles - path to your goal is always difficult. On your way you will face difficult obstacles that you must overcome.​
